name: Cisco NX-OS Base Configuration
description: Base configuration template for Cisco Nexus switches (NX-OS)
features: Global settings (hostname, timezone); Feature activation; VTP configuration; Spanning tree (rapid-pvst); VLAN configuration; Management interface; NTP, DNS, SNMP; Syslog logging; TACACS+ AAA; OSPF/BGP routing; HSRP (for core/distribution); SSH management access; Banner

name: Cisco IOS-XE Base Configuration
description: Base configuration template for Cisco Catalyst switches (IOS-XE)
features: Service timestamps and encryption; Global settings; VTP transparent mode; Spanning tree (rapid-pvst, portfast, bpduguard); VLAN configuration (management, data, voice); Interface templates; NTP, DNS, SNMP; Syslog logging; TACACS+ AAA; SSH management access; PoE configuration (access switches); Banner

name: Cisco IOS-XR Base Configuration
description: Base configuration template for Cisco ASR routers (IOS-XR)
features: Global settings (hostname, timezone); Management and loopback interfaces; NTP, DNS, SNMP; Syslog logging; TACACS+ AAA; OSPF/BGP routing; NETCONF (optional); SSH management access; Banner

name: Cisco IOS Base Configuration
description: Base configuration template for Cisco ISR routers (IOS)
features: Service timestamps and encryption; Global settings; Management and loopback interfaces; NTP, DNS, SNMP; Syslog logging; TACACS+ AAA; SSH management access; Console and VTY line configuration; Banner

name: Cisco IOS-XE Advanced Security
description: COMPLETE configuration template with base features + advanced security for access/distribution switches (IOS-XE)
features: BASE CONFIG: Service timestamps; Hostname; VTP; Spanning tree; VLANs; NTP/DNS/SNMP/Logging; AAA/TACACS+; SSH management; Banner. SECURITY: DHCP Snooping (vlan-based trust ports rate-limiting); Dynamic ARP Inspection (DAI) with validation; Port Security (sticky MAC aging violation recovery); 802.1X Authentication (multi-auth multi-domain RADIUS guest/fail/critical VLANs); Storm Control (broadcast multicast unicast); Interface auto-config (access/trunk VLAN assignment); DHCP Relay/IP Helper

name: Cisco NX-OS Advanced Security
description: COMPLETE configuration template with base features + advanced security for access/distribution switches (NX-OS)
features: BASE CONFIG: Features activation; Hostname; VTP; Spanning tree; VLANs; NTP/DNS/SNMP/Logging; AAA/TACACS+; SSH management; Banner. SECURITY: DHCP Snooping (vlan-based trust ports); Dynamic ARP Inspection (DAI) with validation; Port Security (sticky MAC violation modes); 802.1X Authentication (RADIUS integration); Storm Control (broadcast multicast); Interface auto-config (access/trunk VLAN assignment); DHCP Relay
